title: Phase 1 - HCG and Abstract Pipeline
description:
Phase 1 deliverables focusing on:
- Workstream A: HCG Foundation and Validation
- Workstream B: Sophia Cognitive Core Prototype
- Workstream C: Hermes and Support Services

Key milestones:
- M1: HCG can store and retrieve entities (Week 2)
- M2: SHACL validation catches errors (Week 4)
- M3: Sophia can plan simple actions (Week 6)
- M4: End-to-end 'pick and place' (Week 8)
